attributes.title: Terrible

attributes.title: I wish I could give it less then 1 star
attributes.review: It called me a fat ugly pig kidnapped me for 10 days and when I finally escaped my whole house was gone. Also maybe glitches

attributes.title: Terrible app
attributes.review: I had hard time using it, super slow, glitches, and I think it has virus or something. This app is horrible. Don’t download it, it just a waste of space. 👎🏽👎🏽👎🏽👎🏽

attributes.title: Horrible, just no.
attributes.review: I hate this app. It’s glitchy and it’s all about this weird guy that nobody likes. The bugs make it so hard to use and it never works properly.

attributes.title: would rate a zero if i could
attributes.review: i downloaded to see my favorite glass of simply orange 🍊, but then it started to ask for my dad’s nieces uncles moms brothers grandmas turtles address🤬. then the next day my phone was completely fine before downloading. then i was walking my fish🐠 at the airport and then it started to ask me for my location 🤯, then phone number 😠, and then home address 🤬!! do not download !!

attributes.title: despicable, just horrible really
attributes.review: I was getting my clothes from the dryer then the app dumped water all over them witch made me really frustrated. The app picked up 2 DUI’s this summer and same day shipped my auntie to the nearby Kroger.

attributes.title: No bueno
attributes.review: App is what my friends like to say no bueno. Honestly is trash and if I could give it a negative review sis that would have already been done that. Honestly this app is a tremendous disappointment (and so is his presidency). And I pop...

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: This app made my phone glitch and it deleted everything from it. Do not recommend wish I could give zero stars.

attributes.title: Sad very sad I think it’s the saddest thing ever!
attributes.review: Sad very sad it’s the saddest thing in the whole world. I don’t think anyone ever has seen such a sad thing. I think I should get an award for the saddest app. I mean I did saddest thing then Obama has done 🤯

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: Was actively listening to me talk and sending targeted ads to my phone. Also caused lagging within my device. Terrible app and would not recommend to anyone
